tweet: Closing out Memorial Day week with my second VA health care visit this week. Our veterans deserve the best care, and it’s been great to talk with our professionals to see how Congress can better serve those who served. pic.twitter.com/1B1B3p1KuD

This isn’t a lecture, it’s a conversation. It’s why I’m hoping to see you tomorrow at our town hall. We need everyone working together to solve the opioid crisis. https://twitter.com/AsburyParkPress/status/1134181697791111170 …
Adath Emanu-El has been a staple in our community for 60 years. It was great getting to talk with their next generation last night about the issues impacting our community. pic.twitter.com/Md0zA95c5o
Thanks to everyone who came out for our office hours in Bordentown. We’re just a few days away from our next town hall. Hope to see you there. pic.twitter.com/DWWVIkCyZq

Too many veterans in our district have to leave in order to seek care. East Orange is one facility that takes in and cares for our veterans. A special thanks to their team for the tour and the insights on how we can improve care. pic.twitter.com/3VLtWSeB3H

I ventured up north yesterday to spend time with the men and women at the @VeteransHealth facility in East Orange. New Jersey has more than 350k veterans, and ensuring they have good care is critical. pic.twitter.com/HrGx5n7hWI
Can't make it to my town hall this Saturday? Stop by my office hours tomorrow. From lowering health care costs to supporting our veterans, we've got a lot to talk about. pic.twitter.com/WrAY29G83r

#MemorialDay is a time to reflect on those we've lost and those left behind. I spent time with our veterans in Ocean and Burlington Counties today to reflect on the sacrifices so many have made for our freedoms. pic.twitter.com/BzZ7jWc9yt

Honored to lead this effort with @RepRatcliffe. We must put politics aside when it comes to supporting Gold Star Families. This effort is bipartisan, common-sense and will ensure the sacrifice of so many families is never forgotten. https://twitter.com/RiponAdvance/status/1131527193568456704 …

It was an absolute honor to get to spend time with members of our intelligence community. The work they do every day keeps our country safe and should never be forgotten. https://twitter.com/DefenseIntel/status/1131593183585099776 …

Millions of Americans get closer to retirement every day, which is why I'm proud to have voted to give them the peace of mind they deserve by making it easier to save. The #SECUREAct is bipartisan and shows what we can do when we work together #ForThePeople. pic.twitter.com/DZWBRehGhI

The opioid and addiction crisis that has hit our communities requires greater urgency and a comprehensive strategy. The AAPI community is growing faster than any other minority community in the country. With that growth will come opportunities for a new generation, including my two sons, to build a future where every Asian American and Pacific Islander can have a piece of the American Dream.

Asian Pacific American Heritage Month is a time for us to reflect on the incredible contributions the Asian American and Pacific Islander (AAPI) community have made in making America a more diverse, vibrant and richer place.
